show.title: Love at 50 - Tu Hi Hai Ibadat
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/LzQhhN
show.description: A wealthy businessman, Vikram Singh Rathod, is caught off guard when his daughter invites a group of women to his office, hoping he’ll choose a life partner. To escape, he falsely claims to be married. Meanwhile, Avni Verma, pressured by her daughter-in-law to marry into wealth, also lies about her marital status. Seeking a fake marriage certificate, they meet and agree to a no-strings-attached union, with Avni concealing her identity. But fate intervenes—Vikram accidentally injures Avni, who reenters his life a year later as a cleaner in his office. As Vikram’s daughter insists on meeting her “stepmother,” Avni steps in to play the part, still unaware they are legally married. Amid mistaken identities and emotional chaos, they develop genuine feelings for each other. Eventually, as they attempt to formally divorce and end the charade, they realize they had been truly married all along.
